flavor: The Nibenese see dance as their gift to the world. The dramatic liaka-ih style features whirling dancers in veils, scarves, and ribbons. The comedic and bell-wearing priytu-ih dancers perform for celebrations and joyful events. Militant, weapon-wielding wriquo-ih dancers honor warriors and their battles. You have studied the three forms, learning their techniques. Which form do you prefer?
name: Nibenay - Gifted Dancer
